title: What do Students choose to study ?
summary: 50 percentage of Students choose to study the STEM subjects , less than half that number - 20 percentage choose Literature and 20 percentage Medicine .
Philosophy has the least numbers chosing it - 10 percentage .
gold: This graph shows the percentage of students who choose to study in four different departments . 50 % - STEM \\n 20 % - Literature \\n 10 % - Philosophy \\n 20 % - Medicine
